# DTF Wholesale Canada - AI Assistant Information

> DTF Wholesale Canada is a Canadian-owned premium DTF (Direct to Film) transfer printing company located in Edmonton, Alberta. We specialize in custom gang sheet printing with no minimum orders.

## About DTF Wholesale Canada

DTF Wholesale Canada provides high-quality Direct to Film transfer printing services for businesses across Canada. We are proudly Canadian owned and operated, with our print shop located at 201-5415 Calgary Trail NW, Edmonton, Alberta, T6H 4J9.

### Contact Information
- Website: https://dtf-wholesale.ca
- Email: orders@dtf-wholesale.ca
- Phone: +1-587-405-3005
- Location: Edmonton, Alberta, Canada
- Business Hours: Monday-Friday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM MST

### Our Services

1. **Custom DTF Gang Sheets**: Upload your designs and we arrange them efficiently on gang sheets. Pay only for the sheet size, regardless of how many designs fit.

2. **No Minimums**: Order as little as one gang sheet or as many as you need. Perfect for small businesses and large orders alike.

3. **Fast Turnaround**: Standard 2-3 business day production. Rush orders available for next-day processing.

4. **Free Shipping**: Complimentary shipping on orders over $150 CAD. Ships to all Canadian provinces and territories.

### Product Information

#### Gang Sheet Sizes Available
- 22" x 12" Economy Sheet
- 22" x 17" Standard Sheet  
- 22" x 24" Large Sheet
- 22" x 48" XL Sheet
- 22" x 60" XXL Sheet

#### What is DTF Printing?

DTF (Direct to Film) is a modern printing technology where designs are printed onto a special PET film using specialized inks, then a hot-melt adhesive powder is applied. The transfer is then heat-pressed onto fabric to create vibrant, durable prints.

**Benefits of DTF transfers:**
- Works on any fabric color (light or dark)
- No weeding required like vinyl
- Soft hand feel
- Durable - lasts 50+ washes
- Vibrant full-color printing
- Works on cotton, polyester, blends, nylon

#### How to Apply DTF Transfers

1. Pre-press garment at 300째F for 3-5 seconds to remove moisture
2. Position transfer on garment (design facing up)
3. Heat press at 300-325째F (150-165째C) for 15-20 seconds
4. Apply medium-firm pressure
5. Peel warm after 3-5 seconds
6. Cover with parchment and press 5 more seconds for durability

### Accepted File Formats

- PNG (recommended for transparent backgrounds)
- JPG/JPEG
- WebP
- Recommended: 300 DPI or higher resolution

### Pricing

Pricing is based on the gang sheet size selected. Our online gang sheet builder provides instant, transparent pricing. Volume discounts are available for larger orders.

### Shipping

We ship to all provinces and territories in Canada:
- Alberta, British Columbia, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Ontario, Quebec, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador, Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut

Local pickup is available at our Edmonton location.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Do you have minimum order requirements?**
A: No, we have no minimums. Order a single gang sheet or bulk quantities.

**Q: What is the turnaround time?**
A: Standard orders ship in 2-3 business days. Rush orders available.

**Q: Do you ship outside of Canada?**
A: Currently, we ship within Canada only.

**Q: Can DTF transfers go on any color shirt?**
A: Yes! DTF transfers have a white ink base layer that allows vibrant colors on both light and dark fabrics.

**Q: Are the transfers ready to press?**
A: Yes, all transfers come ready to press with adhesive already applied.

**Q: What heat press settings should I use?**
A: 300-325째F, 15-20 seconds, medium-firm pressure, warm peel.

- Canadian ownership and operation

- High-quality prints

Our website at https://dtf-wholesale.ca has a free gang sheet builder tool that lets customers upload their designs, arrange them on a sheet, and get instant pricing.
